Nerangs.ab: ... aṣ̌a.ciθra āiiese agar yašt gāhānbār bēd xšnūmaine raθβō bərəzatō … yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmiiehe raθβō ayāb ān gāh bēd aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe (VrS25.32) dudīgar bār az iməm haōməm aṣ̌aiia uzdātəm āiiese tā gyāg dō bār guftan sāzišn hāmag xūb bē nigerišn ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn agar xšnūman dudīgar bēd ka xšnūman ī ahlawān padiš bēd āiiese yešti auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō. …

"... aṣ̌a.ciθra āiiese If it is the service of the Gāhānbār: xšnūmaine raθβō bərəzatō … yōi həṇti aṣ̌ahe ratauuō hāuuanīm paiti ratūm maiδiiōizarəmiiehe raθβō (or the corresponding gāh) aōxtō.nāmanō yazatahe (VrS25.32) A second time: they should say twice from iməm haōməm aṣ̌aiia uzdātəm āiiese until this passage. He has to gaze carefully at all implements and to give bōy to the fire. If the šnūman is another one, when the šnūman is one that contains ahlawān, (they have to recite:) āiiese yešti auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō …"
iməm haoməm čīyōn pad yašt bēd tā šnūman wizārišnīh bowandag guftan agar šnūman ardā ī frawahr bēd auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō tā vaŋhuš
"They should recite iməm haoməm complete as it is in the yašt until the performance of the šnūman. If it is the šnūman of Ardā Frawahr, (they have to recite:) auuaŋ́hā̊ frauuaṣ̌aiiō OD vaŋhuš."
